name: Asteroids n' Aliens
description:
Asteroids n' Aliens is a small arcade game where you shoot asteroids to gain points (bosses coming soon).

Controls - WASD to move and space to shoot.

Art - Gustavo Virturi's SpaceShooterAssetPack 

This is my first ever game so I don't expect much people to play it, and I uploaded it publicly just because, but anyways I hope you like it! :)
